value:
It has been quite some time since I
have seen my brother so excited. I'm
getting excited myself!

The envoys of the winter festival
bring happiness to all the children.
Isn't that wonderful?

You're curious about what kinds of
presents I wished for as a child?
That information...will remain secret.

I want to leave a gift beside Ephraim's
pillow. Do you think he will realize it
is from me?

This festival is for everyone to enjoy
equally. Everyone is special at this
festival, or so I'm told.$k$pYou should make sure to have as
much fun with everyone as you can,
even if you're a little bit cold.

I bring you an invitation to the winter
festival from $Nf.

This is more than I wished for!
I feel that I have been blessed.

Seeing everyone enjoying themselves
has given me the courage to fight.

The cold has numbed my hands. I
must prepare more thoroughly next
time.

I can feel this warming my heart...
Truly, I am grateful.

I'm Princess Eirika of Renais. My
brother Ephraim and I have come
to the winter festival this year.

Taking part in this festival with
Ephraim... It's been so long since
I've enjoyed myself this much.$k$pEveryone's in a cheery mood, with
laughter in the air... And they give
presents that really mean something.$k$pThe weather may be cold, but the
warmth of the heart more than makes
up for that.$k$pI hope that one day the chill of war
may be replaced by this warmth and
everyone can enjoy days like these.$k$pIt's up to me to do what I can to
realize a world where everyone
comes together in kindness.
はっ！
どうでしょう？
きゃああっ！
だめですっ…！
Felicitations!
I will pray...
Find peace this eve.
Season's greetings!
The bitter cold of winter...
Well...
A prayer of solace...
Are you well?
This festival warms the hearts of all who attend.
Oh, thank you. This cape never stays on straight!
No surprise that my brother is eager to participate in the tournament at the festival. I wish him well!
Oh, what fun it would have been to play in the snow together. Just the three of us...
I'm very grateful that we can spend the snowy nights of the winter festival together.
Of course.
Brisk!
To winter!
